name: Chrome export cookie.txt
tagline: Google Chrome extension that creates a cookie.txt
body:
Allows users to export their session cookie data from Chrome to a legacy Netscape/Mozilla file format so wget (and other tools) can use it. 

This allows wget to continue a possibly authenticated session that was started in a Chrome. 

# Installation #
## [Google Chrome Web Store](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/cookiestxt/njabckikapfpffapmjgojcnbfjonfjfg) ##
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
